reviews.review: very good game for good gamer

It is quite difficult for anyone who is starting the game since the community is kind of toxic to new players and the learning curve is quite high. The game is awesome to play and the different maps are nice to have. I used to play pubg a lot and this definitely feels like a good alternative if you are currently bored at pubg.
